name: FTPSync
description: A cog for backing up files from FTP servers to Discord channels with optional ZIP compression.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores FTP configuration data including host, port, username, password, and backup file paths for each guild.
install_msg: Thank you for installing FTPSync! Use `setftpconfig` to configure your FTP connection and `addbackuppath` to add files to backup.
author: strafer
